pages.text: $(li)Moose are neutral, large, tall, brown hairy mammals with 2 large antlers of their head that that live in the Snowy Plaints and Taigas.$(br)$(li)Moose can sometimes be seen wandering with their children following closely behind.
Around every 7 to 10 Minecraft days, Moose can drop Moose Antler.
$(li)If two adult Moose are near each other, they will jostle for dominance.
